metadata.name: Suspicious Execution Location Of Wermgr.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious Windows Error Reporting manager (wermgr.exe) execution location.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wermgr.exe')) AND NOT (startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\syswow64\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\winsxs\\\\'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious Windows Error Reporting manager (wermgr.exe) execution location.
